com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics

Interface ThemedTextGraphics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TextGraphics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmutableThemedTextGraphics, TextGUIGraphics

    public interface ThemedTextGraphics
extends TextGraphics
    Expanded TextGraphics that adds methods to interact with themes
    Author:
    Martin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ThemedTextGraphics applyThemeStyle(ThemeStyle themeStyle)
      Takes a ThemeStyle as applies it to this TextGraphics.
      ThemeDefinition getThemeDefinition(Class<?> clazz)
      Retrieves the ThemeDefinition associated with the class parameter passed in.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.TextGraphics

        clearModifiers, disableModifiers, drawImage, drawImage, drawLine, drawLine, drawLine, drawLine, drawRectangle, drawRectangle, drawTriangle, drawTriangle, enableModifiers, fill, fillRectangle, fillRectangle, fillTriangle, fillTriangle, getActiveModifiers, getBackgroundColor, getForegroundColor, getSize, getTabBehaviour, newTextGraphics, putString, putString, putString, putString, setBackgroundColor, setCharacter, setCharacter, setCharacter, setCharacter, setForegroundColor, setModifiers, setTabBehaviour

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeDefinition

        ThemeDefinition getThemeDefinition(Class<?> clazz)
        Retrieves the ThemeDefinition associated with the class parameter passed in. The implementation should make sure that there is always a fallback available if there's no direct definition for this class; the method should never return null.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to search ThemeDefinition for
        Returns:
        ThemeDefinition that was resolved for this class

      • applyThemeStyle

        ThemedTextGraphics applyThemeStyle(ThemeStyle themeStyle)
        Takes a ThemeStyle as applies it to this TextGraphics. This will effectively set the foreground color, the background color and all the SGRs.
        Parameters:
        themeStyle - ThemeStyle to apply
        Returns:
        Itself
